General.Name: Juva Life Inc
General.Description: Juva Life Inc. acquires, owns, and operates in cannabis business in medical and recreational cannabis sectors in California, the United States. The company operates through two segments, The Resale of Merchandise and Cannabis-Derived Products and Cultivation and Sale of Trim and Flowers. Juva Life Inc. was founded in 2018 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4N7
